titleStmt.title: Ionsonus virbius: or, The memorie of Ben: Iohnson revived by the friends of the Muses
titleStmt.author: Duppa, Brian, 1588-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. P[urslowe] for Henry Seile, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Tygers Head in Fleetstreet, over-against Saint Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the Tygers Head in Fleetstreet, over-against Saint Dunstans Church
